long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Add-on that recommend film to users about the latest popular film, it's designed for those who always stumbled upon the problems of not knowing what to watch when browsing movie streaming services, for having so many choices. With this tool, u will be recommended with the right movie to watch and gone of the days of hesitating on deciding what movie to watch.
